main event: A civilian observer watched a bright silver-colored object that appeared to be an aircraft and then disappeared from sight.
interesting points: The object was described as having a gently sloping top, curved down and out on the sides, and flat on the bottom, resembling a 'saucer' or a 'bowl'.
The object was estimated to be about 75 feet in diameter.
The object did not make any unusual maneuvers and simply appeared to accelerate rapidly before disappearing.
The observer viewed the object through the windshield of their automobile and used sunglasses as an optical aid.
The weather conditions at the time of the sighting were clear with good visibility.
